plot: In a remote desert on an unspecified planet, a large terraforming robot - called a MEK- has gone down. A lone serviceman has been sent out into the hostile, unforgiving location to repair the machine, only to find that he is not alone.
title: 7x6x2
plot_es: In a remote desert on an unspecified planet, a large terraforming robot - called a MEK- has gone down. A lone serviceman has been sent out into the hostile, unforgiving location to repair the machine, only to find that he is not alone.
